command.structurify.locate.exception.all: Can't locate any structure, all structures are disabled based on the Structurify mod config.
command.structurify.locate.structure_is_: Can't locate %s structure, structure is currently disabled based on the Structurify mod config.
gui.structurify.title: Structurify configuration
gui.structurify.structures.title: Structure settings
gui.structurify.structure_sets.title: Structure Spread settings
gui.structurify.structures_category.desc: Disable or enable the generation of structures within the game. Additionally, manage a blacklist of biomes where specific structures should not generate.
gui.structurify.structures.structures_gr: List of all structures for the „%s“ namespace.
gui.structurify.structures.global.title: Global settings
gui.structurify.structures.disable_all_s: All structures will be disabled regardless of the specific structure options.
gui.structurify.structures.min_structure: Min. distance from world center (in blocks)
All structures will only generate if they are farther than specified distance from the world center.
gui.structurify.structures.biomes_descri: Structure can be found in the following biomes:
gui.structurify.structures.warning: Bear in mind that each structure may still be enabled or disabled by individual mods and datapacks.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ena: The structure will only generate if the terrain within the specified distance is flat enough based on the specified threshold.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.fla: The distance in blocks from the structure’s center within which terrain flatness will be checked.
The maximum height difference (in blocks) allowed for the terrain to be considered flat.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.ena: The structure will only generate if all biomes within the specified distance are present in the list below.
gui.structurify.structures.structure.bio: The distance in blocks from the structure’s center within which biomes will be checked.
List of current biomes in which the „%s“ structure can be generated.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.warning: Bear in mind that each structure set may have unique placement rules and overrides defined by individual mods and datapacks, which means that changing this value might not always produce the intended structure spread.
Configure custom structure spread either via global spacing and separation modifier or per structure specific spacing and separation values.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.enable_gl: Enable global spacing and separation modifier
Spacing and separation of each structure set will be multiplied by this value.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.global_sp:
When different from default value of 1.0, each structure set will be either more concentrated or more spread out.

 < 1.0 - more concentrated 
 = 1.0 - unaffected 
 > 1.0 - more spread out
gui.structurify.structure_sets.override_: Whenever to override global spacing and separation modifier from global settings with structure set specific settings.
gui.structurify.structure_sets.spacing.d: Spacing is the average distance in chunks between structures within the same structure set (group of structures).
gui.structurify.structure_sets.separatio: Separation is the minimum distance in chunks between structures within the same structure set (group of structures). The separation value cannot be greater than the spacing value.
